s1.name: ASM Framework plugin for Eclipse
s1.p: ASM Framework plugin provides the ASM Framework libraries.
s1.subtitle: Installation
s1.p: The ASM Framework plugin can be installed from the Eclipse Update Manager with the ObjectWeb Eclipse Update Site http://download.forge.objectweb.org/eclipse-update/
Alternatively, the plugin can be downloaded from the ObjectWeb Forge site, and manually installed in the Eclipse plugins directory.
